ValidationRule.description: Before changing the status to "Open - Awaiting App (App Sent)t" or "Converted", require annual sales.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR( CONTAINS(TEXT(Status), 'App Sent'), CONTAINS( TEXT(Status), 'Converted')), ISBLANK(Annual_Gross_Sales__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide Annual Gross Sales if the Lead status is 'Open - Awaiting App (App Sent)' or 'Converted'.
